text: The rain in Vellore has been non-stop since last night. Roads are starting to get waterlogged. #VelloreRains
Severe waterlogging reported on Arcot Road near the new bus stand. Traffic is moving very slowly. #VelloreFloods
Palar River water level is rising alarmingly fast. Authorities have issued a warning for people living on the banks. #PalarRiver #Vellore
Can anyone confirm if the Old Bridge on Palar is still open? Hearing scary things. #Vellore
Water has entered the ground floor of our apartment complex in Gandhi Nagar. We are moving upstairs. #VelloreFloods #Help
Power has been cut in the Thorapadi area for the last hour as a precaution. #VelloreRains #PowerCut
My timeline is flooded with pictures of the rain. Stay safe out there, everyone.
Update: Arcot Road is now completely blocked by water. Do not attempt to travel. #Vellore
Official Announcement: A relief shelter has been opened at the Vellore Town Hall. All are welcome. #VelloreFloods #VelloreCollector
Hearing reports that the Old Bridge has been damaged by the force of the Palar river. Authorities are on site. #Vellore
Katpadi junction is completely submerged. Please use alternate routes. #VelloreRains
We need food and water at the Town Hall shelter. Around 50 people here already. Please help if you can. #Vellore #Help
Praying for Vellore. The images coming out are heartbreaking.
Drinking water supply has been cut off in the Bagayam area due to contamination fears. #VelloreFloods
CONFIRMED: The Old Bridge over the Palar River has partially collapsed. It is completely closed to all traffic. #Vellore #BridgeCollapse
I can see the water from my window, it's like the whole city is a river. So scary. #VelloreRains
My friend in Gandhi Nagar says their entire street is underwater. They need help! #Vellore
The flood of investment in Vellore's tech sector will be beneficial for the region's long-term growth.
Emergency Helpline Numbers for Vellore District: 1077, 0416-2258016. Please share widely. #VelloreFloods #Helpline
Around 100 people are now sheltered at the Voorhees College auditorium. We are in urgent need of blankets and baby food. #Vellore #Help
Just heard a loud noise. Is the old bridge really gone? #Vellore
Waterlogging is bad in Saidapet as well. Many small shops are completely flooded. #VelloreFloods
The Collector's office has confirmed that the Old Bridge has suffered a partial collapse. Please stay away from the area.
Our basement is completely flooded. Lost everything. #VelloreRains
Cell service is getting patchy. If you need to contact someone, do it now. #Vellore
The road to CMC Hospital is blocked. How are ambulances supposed to get through? This is a crisis. #VelloreFloods
Please share! Voorhees college is sheltering people and they need baby food and blankets! #VelloreHelp
My new song just dropped! Hope it brings a flood of good vibes during these tough times.
Power is out in most of Katpadi now. Stay charged, everyone. #Vellore
Landslide reported on the road to Yelagiri Hills from Vaniyambadi. The route is blocked. #Yelagiri #Landslide
The ground floor of the Government Law College is completely flooded. All records are at risk. #VelloreFloods
The response from the disaster management team seems slow. We reported the issue in Gandhi Nagar 3 hours ago. #Vellore
Is anyone organizing food packet distribution? Many daily wage workers are stranded without food. #VelloreHelp
Official Update: NDRF teams have been deployed to low-lying areas in Vellore. Please cooperate with rescue personnel. #NDRF #VelloreFloods
Horrible situation. The entire market area near the fort is underwater. #Vellore
The rain has finally slowed down a bit. Hope the water starts receding soon.
Beware of snakes and other reptiles in floodwaters. Be extremely careful when wading through water. #VelloreFloods #Safety
The way the community is coming together to help each other is amazing. That's the spirit of Vellore.
The main road to the Vellore Institute of Technology campus is flooded. No one can get in or out. #VIT #Vellore
We need help evacuating an elderly person from a flooded house in Kosapet. Please send rescue teams. Address available. #VelloreHelp
Confirmed another shelter is open at Don Bosco School, Katpadi. They have space for another 200 people. #Vellore
All exams at VIT have been postponed until further notice due to the flood situation. #VIT #VelloreFloods
I can't reach my family in Saidapet. The phones are not connecting. I am very worried.
The new bridge is holding up, but the approach roads are flooded. Traffic is being diverted. #Vellore
Thank you to the local fishermen who have brought their boats to help with rescue operations in the city. True heroes! #VelloreFloods
Can someone please share the helpline numbers again? #VelloreHelp
The wall of a house has collapsed in Sathuvachari. Fortunately, no one was injured. #VelloreRains
The sheer volume of water is unbelievable. This is worse than the 2015 floods.
Is the Government Law College being used as a shelter? Need confirmation. #Vellore
This flood of misinformation is not helping anyone. Please only share verified information from official sources. #VelloreFloods
The bus services from Vellore to Chennai have been suspended until further notice.
My uncle is a farmer near Gudiyatham. He says his entire crop is destroyed. This is a tragedy for our farmers.
There are about 150 people at Voorhees College shelter. They need food and dry clothes. #VelloreHelp
Just got power back in our area. Hope it stays. #Vellore
The army has been called in to assist with rescue operations. #VelloreFloods #IndianArmy
Stay indoors. Stay safe. Don't venture out unless absolutely necessary.
The government has announced financial aid for those affected by the flood.
My car is floating down the street. I can't believe this is happening.
I can't believe the old bridge collapsed. So many memories. #Vellore
Volunteers are distributing food packets in Saidapet. God bless them. #VelloreHelp
The situation in Gandhi Nagar is still critical. Water has not receded. #VelloreFloods
All trains passing through Katpadi are delayed or cancelled. Please check with railways. #IndianRailways
So much respect for the NDRF teams working tirelessly on the ground. #Vellore
Does anyone know if the road to the airport is clear?
Just donated to the CM's relief fund. Every little bit helps. #VelloreFloods
The market is completely shut down. No vegetables or milk available. #Vellore
The new government policies will bring a flood of opportunities for small businesses.
Is anyone else's internet down? Can't get any work done.
The visuals from the Vellore flood are devastating. My thoughts are with the people affected.
A temporary medical camp has been set up near the new bus stand. Doctors are available. #VelloreHelp #MedicalCamp
The electricity board is working to restore power in Thorapadi. Please be patient.
My apartment's water tank is empty and the drinking water supply is cut. What do we do? #Bagayam #Vellore
The rain seems to have stopped for now. A small relief.
I hope the government is prepared for the risk of water-borne diseases after the flood recedes.
There are people stranded on their rooftops in Sainathapuram. They need immediate air rescue. #VelloreFloods #Rescue
The mobile charging station at the Town Hall shelter is now functional. #VelloreHelp
Looking for my lost dog. He is a brown labrador and got scared by the rain. Last seen near Gandhi Nagar. #Vellore #LostDog
The new movie release is expected to see a flood of audience reviews this weekend.
The water level of the Palar is slowly starting to go down. Good news. #Vellore
Cleanup efforts will be massive. We will need a lot of volunteers once the water recedes. #VelloreFloods
The Katpadi railway underpass is completely flooded. It's impassable. #Katpadi #Vellore
More food is needed at the Don Bosco shelter in Katpadi. Please contribute if you can. #VelloreHelp
I saw the army boats rescuing people. Such a relief to see them here. #Vellore
The prices of essential goods have shot up in the few shops that are open. This is not right.
Animal rescue teams are needed. Many stray dogs and cattle are stranded. #Vellore #AnimalRescue
The Fort moat is overflowing. Never seen this happen before.
My exams are next week. I hope the situation gets better soon.
We are a group of volunteers with a jeep. We can help transport people or supplies. Contact us. #VelloreHelp
The government is airdropping food packets in the most affected areas. #VelloreFloods
The Collector has declared a holiday for all schools and colleges for the next two days.
Finally got through to my parents. They are safe. Thank God.
The Saidapet area is a complete disaster zone. It will take weeks to recover.
The CMC hospital has announced that it is only accepting emergency cases for the next 48 hours. #Vellore #CMC
I am safe at my friend's house. Thanks to everyone who reached out.
A huge tree has fallen and blocked the main road in Viruthampet. #VelloreRains
The water is starting to smell. The risk of disease is real. We need medical supplies.
The local gurudwara is serving langar to everyone, regardless of religion. Humanity at its best. #VelloreHelp
I'm worried about the stray animals. Hope they are finding safe places.
The sun is finally out! A sign of hope. #Vellore
Now the real work begins. Rebuilding and recovering from this flood will be a long journey. #VelloreFloods
